Slack Bot’s flow diagram¶

graph TD; A(/GetHelp Can not connect to VPN) --> B(Do any of these help?) B --> |Fetch related KB articles| B B --> |No| D(Would you like to create a ticket?) B --> |Yes| C(Glad to help!) D --> |Yes| F(I will first need some contact information. What is the best email to reach you at?) D --> |Not right now| E(Please reach us at XXX or use /GetHelp whenever you need help) F --> |email| G(What is the best phone number to reach you at?) G --> |xxx-xxx-xxxx| H(What is the prefered method of contact?) H --> |email or phone| I(Perfect! Is Can not connect to VPN an accuret description of the issue?) I --> |Yes| J(Your ticket has been submitted! Someone should be in contact with you shortly. ETA is X) I --> |No| K(Please provide a brief description of the issue) K --> |User provides details| J
